reviews.review: 一共玩了3个小时，1个小时看攻略过新手教程，1.5个小时排队时间，0.5个小时挨毒打，选人你睡一觉都不一定能开，选屠夫秒进，然后就是一个白板屠夫被一堆满级技能的人皇军训，半个小时里面我的电脑屏幕一半都是白光，人6分钟左右能修好全部电机，剩下的就是和你互动，才打了几盘就有外挂出现，故意给你砍倒挂钩，然后挣脱下来满血，然后在挂钩，在满血挣脱....现在想退款也不给退，我能怎么办，我也很绝望

This game is unplayable. You lose no matter which side you pick, the controls are unresponsive and laggy. it takes hours to search a killer game. It's so unbalance, and people kept complaining perks and hex that killers bring, but it's unplayable when you have slow down 50 million times when you hit a survivor and then there is so many penalties when it comes to killer add on or perks. It's so unbalance, it's so hard to play a game where you have to lose 90% of the match to grind points to get to a certain Hex, Perk or add on. Fix your game, it's so BS.

Jogo DBD há algum tempo (quase dois anos) e posso afirmar que o jogo nunca deixa de ser viciante. É claro que possui erros de jogabilidade e alguns bugs, mas a mecânica do jogo foi muito bem pensada. Acredito que um dos pontos negativos hoje e que merece um empenho da Behaviour é a falta do "cross save", o que se torna um problema quando você investe dinheiro no jogo para comprar itens e personagens. Todavia, pouco acredito que seja o caso de players do Steam. Além de todo o exposto, não posso deixar de destacar a importância do game para o cenário LGBTQIA+, que recebeu muito bem o jogo e o mantém vivo, até mesmo como forma de resistência frente aos jogos de público majoritariamente heterossexual. DBD é mais que um simples jogo de horror, tornou-se uma marca de expressão e lutar.
I approve this message
If you like horror and video games, buy this game. Get over the initial learning curve. figure out the game play loop and enjoy!

por donde empezar...cuando empece en el juego hace ya un año mas o menos parecia divertido, aunque empece jugando como asesino y me parecia dificil porque perdia mucho pero simplemente supuse que era porque no entendia el juego por completo...nada mas alejado de la realidad, es u juego completa y descardamente desbalanceado donde jugar de asesino es un suplicio si no dispones de perks buenas e incluso asi cuesta mucho hacer algo contra los survivors(en este juego los survivors le hacen bullyng al killer y no al reves como se esperaria), la optimizacion no es la mejor, los bugs abundan, hay un total abandono hacia la comunidad en general(solo se fijan en la opinion de los fog whisperers), y un largo etcetera.
en resumen lo definiria como "juega de survivor" el juego(y esto lo note cuando despues de un año empece a jugar como survivor sin nada de experiencia en esa rama y de 10 partidas solo perdi una y fue por ayudar a un compañero).
concluyo esta reseña diciendo que si no arreglan el juego y siguen como van ojala VHS les quite el puesto y nos de lo que ellos prefieren no darnos y seguir trayendo licencias...
It's terrible idk why I play

tl;dr: 
behaviour is awful, but the game is alright now

The ways in which behaviour has displayed their complete lack of respect for their customers could fill pages at this point. 
For a long time the game has been absolutely broken and so technically flawed that it was on the verge of being unplayable. 
Worse yet, every time the devs do anything, something seems to break. The countless oversights are not acknowledged as such, instead pretended to be intended features (no matter how laughably obvious their fuck-up has been). 

That being said the game is in the best state it has ever been .. just don't expect it to ever be as good as it could have been. 

Pros:
-playing survivor is usually fun
-killer design and variety is cool and you get all your favorite franchise killers (except for jason lol)

Cons:
-behaviour
-In 5 years they have not been able to make any balancing efforts towards premade groups whatsoever
-thusly playing killer is mostly stressful and frustrating
-the game provides many tools for people to purposely ruin the fun of other players (on both sides)
-overpriced DLC content, especially cosmetics 


In my opinion it's impossible for the game to ever become great. The reason being, that they failed to fix the core issues in game design when the game was in it's infant state. Instead they added plaster fix upon plaster fix.

The game is like a tall, wonky tower,
好玩

This game has on a steady decline for some time now. They celebrated a 5 year anniversary while there are still 5 year old bugs still in the game. Each dlc/patch they push out breaks something completely different, this to me shows little to no internal QA at all. The new mmr is horrible and not thought out at all, there are many videos online that show as a survivor the only thing that is taken in to account is match time and escape/death. Nothing in the match is counted for which means the survivors that hide in corners not doing gens and run out the gate as quickly as possible get rewarded the same mmr points as a survivor who fixed multiple gens, unhooked multiple survivors, was in chases with the killer and helped get others out. What this does is make it so good killers get unbalanced teams with some good players and some bad players. There are many forums and videos on this, I can understand why Stranger Things opted to not renew the license with how much bad press this game gets. 

Every content creator including dead by daylight partners as well as fog whispers are talking about how they can not wait for something else to come out so they can move on. This game is currently hanging on by the thread of its licenses as well as the severe lack of competition in the genre. I personally refuse to purchase any further dlc or cosmetics until this company fixes the major issues it is facing in the current game. 

Even if you are able to look past all this, you then get to deal with the rising amount of hackers that are breaking the game on purpose and a very toxic community that loves telling each other things like go kill yourself in the end game chats. 

If you are on the fence about buying this game I would recommend trying anything else, It is truly sad to have been playing during the rise and fall of dbd.

This game is pretty awesome, it's like manhunt or hide and go-seek but on Russian Olympian sized steroids. The balance can feel off but its the best 4v1 game out there at the moment. Super fun with a group of friends.

The killer require the most skill expression by far, but survivors require good team work for victory. I'm not a fan of the horror genre, but this is an exception because the gameplay loop is solid, and the use of sound is pretty awesome.
Fun game but gets boring pretty fast
I'm a horror fanatic and game keeps me on my toes. If you like the thrill of the hunt or surviving it, this game is for you!

Se você assim como eu é um entusiasta de filmes de terror, vai curtir o jogo. O problema são as incontáveis DLCs que o jogo disponibiliza, sem sequer ter um "pacotão" em que possamos comprar todos os sobreviventes e assassinos do game. Isso de certa forma te traz um senso de desvantagem, já que muitos dos sobrevivente e assassinos top tier do jogo são, advinha, pagos.

Ainda assim, dá para extrair umas boas horas de diversão, mesmo com as extensas limitações do jogo base. Recomendo o jogo, mas se você pensa em encarar o jogo com um viés mas competitivo, prepare-se para gastar uma boa grana com DLCs. No caso, estou esperando alguma promoção boa para adquirir todos os personagens do jogo e eu recomendaria o mesmo para todos.

Tirando isso, um excelente jogo, especialmente se você curte filmes de terror.

Como toda outra droga, no começo é muito bom, você se diverte, tem bons momentos, da aquela euforia. Mas como toda droga, você consegue parar? Nãaaaaao.
Comunidade toxica que nem acidente nuclear. Você passa mal já no lobby.
